Package net.ligreto.builders

Interface Summary
BuilderInterface  
 

Class Summary
ExcelReportBuilder This is the implementation of the ReportBuilder to produce Microsoft Excel HSSF files using Apache POI library.
ExcelStreamReportBuilder Provides the streaming version of XSSF Apache POI report generator.
ReportBuilder This class defines the interface between the various report executors and the target report format.
 

Enum Summary
BuilderInterface.CellFormat Keep the enumeration of the possible cell formatting changes.
BuilderInterface.HeaderType The types of the headers.
ExcelReportBuilder.OutputFormat The output file type enumeration.
